name: py-twine

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Twine is a utility for publishing Python packages on PyPI.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pkginfo
dependencies.description: Query metadatdata from sdists / bdists / installed packages.

dependencies.name: py-readme-renderer
dependencies.description:
readme_renderer is a library for rendering "readme" descriptions for
Warehouse.

dependencies.name: py-requests-toolbelt
dependencies.description:
A toolbelt of useful classes and functions to be used with python-
requests

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-glmsingle
dependent_to.description: A toolbox for accurate single-trial estimates in fMRI time-series data.

dependent_to.name: py-python-daemon
dependent_to.description:
Library to implement a well-behaved Unix daemon process. This library
implements the well-behaved daemon specification of PEP Standard daemon
process. A well-behaved Unix daemon process is tricky to get right, but
the required steps are much the same for every daemon program. A
DaemonContext instance holds the behaviour and configured process
environment for the program; use the instance as a context manager to
enter a daemon state.
